Description: Work up to a single @ TM; 70%x5, 80%x3–5, 90%x1, 100%(TM)x1. Used between Leader→Anchor or when run down.
Example: After 2 Leader cycles, run Deload before Anchor.

Description: Verify TM: 70x5, 80x5, 90x5, 100%(TM) x 3–5. If 3–5 is hard, TM is too high; adjust.
Example: Aim for ≥3 reps if 90% TM; ≥5 if 85% TM.
Competitive week; often paired with 5’s PRO.

Description: Run Leaders at 80% TM to preserve bar speed.
Easy aerobic conditioning is required for recovery/health.
Train, don’t test; leave margin on hard conditioning.
Example: If best prowler = 10×40 yd in 15 min, train it slower (20 min) or lighter.

Description: Mobility daily (~10 min) and 10–20 total jumps/throws.
Example: Box jumps + med-ball throws before main work.
